articles.description: The iPhone 12 may cost $50 more than the iPhone 11 without a charger or EarPods on the box
articles.content:
• Analyst Jeff Pu says that the iPhone 12's price will start at $749, which is $50 more than the iPhone 11.
  • The price increase would be due to 5G, even though a charger and EarPods will… [+2176 chars]
